item.title: Software Architecture - mind maps
item.author: Author
item.description: I started to create some minmal mind maps about Software Architecture. The current mind maps were created based on the book “Head first - software architecture”. Eventually I will later extend those. Software Architecture Roadmap You start with architectural characteristics. Then you’ll need to get the logical components, pick a style and finally document your decision. Software Architecture Mind Map Architectural Characteristics Logical Components Architectural Style Architectural Decisions MCP - Model Context Protocol Mind Map illustrates basic concepts Figure 1: MCP - Model Context Protocol Mind Map visualizing basic concepts

item.title: MCP - Model Context Protocol - mind map
item.author: Author
item.description: In the following mind map, I attempted to visualize some core concepts of MCP - Model Context Protocol MCP - Model Context Protocol mind map MCP - Model Context Protocol Mind Map illustrates basic concepts Figure 1: MCP - Model Context Protocol Mind Map visualizing basic concepts Download the mind map in multiple formats: MindMap PNG MindMap JPG MindMap SVG

item.title: OpenTelemetry - mind map - concepts
item.author: Author
item.description: In the following mind map, I attempted to visualize some core concepts of OpenTelemetry The purpose of OpenTelemetry is to collect, process and export signals. The signals (telemetry data) which OpenTelemetry currently supports can be found on the right side of the mind map: Signals: Traces Metrics Logs The mind map illustrates the components that make up these signals and how they are interconnected. To learn more about OpenTelemetry: Official docs: What is OpenTelemetry?

item.title: GenAI Azure Databricks - mind map - capabilities
item.author: Author
item.description: This mind map provides a detailed overview of the GenAI capabilities available in Azure Databricks. Also, check out the Azure Databricks Key Concepts mind map GenAI capabilities Azure Databricks mind map Azure Databricks Mind Map showcasing GenAI capabilities Figure 1: GenAI Capabilities on Azure Databricks Mind Map visualizing key capabilities Download the mind map in multiple formats: MindMap PNG MindMap JPG MindMap SVG

item.title: MLflow - mind map - core components
item.author: Author
item.description: This mind map offers a comprehensive overview of the core components of MLflow. An interesting fact about MLflow is that it was originally developed by Databricks, with which it maintains strong integration. MLflow Mind Map MLflow Mind Map showcasing core components Figure 1: MLflow Mind Map visualizing core components Download the mind map in multiple formats: MindMap PNG MindMap JPG MindMap SVG

item.title: Azure Kubernetes - mind map - key concepts
item.author: Author
item.description: As part of my recent studies about Azure Kubernetes, I’ve created a mindmap that outlines and connects some of its core concepts. This mindmap serves as a visual guide to help you navigate the powerful capabilities of Azure Kubernetes and understand how its key components interrelate. item.title: Azure Databricks - mind map - key concepts
item.author: Author
item.description: As part of my recent deep dive into Azure Databricks, I’ve created a mindmap that outlines and connects some of its core concepts. This mindmap serves as a visual guide to help you navigate the powerful capabilities of Databricks and understand how its key components interrelate. Explore essential areas like: 📊 Data Management 🗄️: Centralized governance, cataloging, and access control. 🛠️ Data Engineering 📊: Tools for building data pipelines, notebooks, and version control.
